Articles.Content:
Funny how the UK still lacks a space program while India, a country pretty damaged by poverty manages to send stuff to Mars.

This doesn't even deserve a snarky comment, it's just wrong. It might have changed name and been split between agencies at various times, but we've had a continuous programme since the late 50s.

Funny how the UK still lacks a space program while India, a country pretty damaged by poverty manages to send stuff to Mars.

that's probably because the Indian space program is self-sufficient; ISRO earns money by launching satellites for other nations. As for the UK's space program, I personally admire the level of co-operation Europeans have. If only China and India could work together......

Successful test-firing of the Liquid Apogee Motor (LAM) engine after 300 days in hibernation. The full insertion maneuver will take 24 minutes (today's test was just under 4 seconds), and is scheduled for the morning of the 24th. It's getting so close... very exciting!
We are so close to being the first program to get to mars on the first attempt !
I think this calls for a KSP Real Solar System marathon to develop a replica to the MOM. I'll see if I can succeed in making one (I haven't reached other planets in RSS so far)

We are so close to being the first program to get to mars on the first attempt !

Sorry, but you'd be second after ESA.

Sorry, but you'd be second after ESA.

Oops ! sorry about that thanks for the correction !
Although you would be the first to be the first to get their on your first launch, given Mars Express was launched by the Russians.
Live coverage starts in one hour.
lets see if the indians can break the curse of the red planet
Livestream is on. They sometimes switch to hindi commentary, though.
webcast link ISRO
spacecraft orientation and burn is about to begin !!!
In eclipse.
Predicted start of MOI.
Confirmation of start of burn in 2 minutes ( delay is 12 minutes )
Burn has started on time
Confirmation of burn start.
The engines work! The burn is on!
Telemetry will lost from 7.34 IST to 8.00 IST as MOM will be on the far side.
Burn should be over and rotation should be complete by now....
They've done it. Its in orbit.
MOM is now IN MARS ORBIT !!!!!!!!
In orbit. Or at least I assume, they just started applauding without announcing anything.
